description:
Fashion Girls & Super Puzzler in one game!
Calling all fashionistas!

Classic Arcade Puzzle Game comes back as a mix between Fashion & Puzzle!

In Fashion Girls you will become a fashionista trying to obtain new costumes and try to become the best photographer out there.

- 80 levels!
- Hundreds of mix betweens costumes, backgrounds and items!
- Photo mode!
- Three stars system, giving the game replayability!
- Affordable price!
- Aimed at kids & adults alike!

Play the game, obtain the costumes and save the fashion together withâ€¦. Fashion Girls!
name: Fashion Girls
intro: Fashion Girls & Awesome Puzzles in One Game!
